linkjvm.libkovan

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • linkjvm.libkovan.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Controller class provides all functions from the libkovan, which does not really belong to a special robot component.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Markus Klein
